hierarchy.entry_domain: Secure Design Principles as Security Models

active_learning.discussion_prompt: To what extent does the Economy of Mechanism principle apply to modern cloud-native applications with microservices? Compare a monolithic simple app versus a complex microservices setup prone to misconfigurations (e.g., Capital One breach). Discuss trade-offs between scalability and security simplicity.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
